labels.label: The process group below (PutES) gets random user data from a public API, then inserts each user document into Elasticsearch

This flow uses InvokeHttp to call the Elasticsearch Search API to retrieve all document IDs for users who are female. FetchElasticsearch is then used to retrieve those documents and write them to disk.

The flow below gets documents from Elasticsearch. Specify the ID to retrieve. This can be done dynamically by sending FlowFiles, each with an attribute containing the ID, then using Expression Language in the FetchElasticsearch processor to refer to the attribute. This example uses the mod() operator to get IDs from 0 to 9.
This flow gets random user data from a public API, then inserts each user document into Elasticsearch
